page.title: 17FARMING
page.content: Mr. Bradley has 200 acres at Winnats Head farm,1300 ft.a.s.l. He has 30 store cattle (Herefords/charolais),300 sheep Gritstone and Mashams and 4 sheepdogs.2 men run it exept at shearing and haymaking time.It is mainly rough grazing ,fertilised and manured .18 acres are for hay.He has to buy more in. Stock graze out from May to October, and fattened inside to be sold late Autumn at Leek ,Bakewell or Hope markets.He has 1 tractor a muck-spreader an hay making machine. Sheep are branded WP(Winnats Pass).Some have been killed in the Winnats pass as it gets busier.Mam Tor road is closed ,alternative route. Today's prices ;sheepdog Â£250 ; 2 year old fat store cattle Â£500, 4 yr old sheep,fat lambs Â£35,one fleece Â£2. Tourists cause few problems.{
